x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying x-coordinate of guide

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x} is only given as a numeric.Default value is \code{default.units = "inches"}

linecolor.description: Character value indicating color of guideline.Default value is \code{linecolor = "grey55"}

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
